source: Trump: US ‘needs a good shutdown’. President Trump on Tuesday called for a "good shutdown" in September to fix the "mess” in government.

President Trump Calls for a "Good Shutdown" in September to Fix Government "Mess". President Donald Trump made a bold statement on Tuesday, saying that he supports a government shutdown in September to fix the "mess."

Trump's frustration with budget compromise has him considering merits of a 'shutdown'. Congress looks set to enact a bipartisan spending bill to avert an imminent government shutdown. But President Trump is suggesting he'd actually welcome a shutdown the next time around.
target: "Good Shutdown" in September?. President Donald Trump made a strong statement on Tuesday, saying that he supports a government shutdown in September to fix the "mess."
